## Testing namespace

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[getTestingWebpackCompilerAsync(entry, additionalConfig, memFs)](./webpack-plugin-utilities.testing.gettestingwebpackcompilerasync.md)


</td><td>

This function generates a webpack compiler with default configuration and the output filesystem mapped to a memory filesystem. This is useful for testing webpack plugins/loaders where we do not need to write to disk (which can be costly).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
